CustomField.description: Discuss product differences the inserter may experience compared to current product • Non-taper • Catheter stiffness — difference in feel • User’s comfort level with a buddy wire • GlideThru® Sheath — reduces need for skin nick • Explain A and B bevel/safety non-safety needles • Nitinol 45 cm wire vs stainless • IR/Radiology — Hydrophilic coated wire • Dressing protocol related to antithrombogenic properties • Reinforce clamping if moving from valved catheter
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Discuss product differences the inserter may experience compared to current product • Non-taper • Catheter stiffness — difference in feel • User’s comfort level with a buddy wire • GlideThru® Sheath — reduces need for skin nick • Explain A and B bevel/safety non-safety needles • Nitinol 45 cm wire vs stainless • IR/Radiology — Hydrophilic coated wire • Dressing protocol related to antithrombogenic properties • Reinforce clamping if moving from valved catheter
CustomField.label: Discuss Product Differences...
